name: e-commerce
description: E-commerce API project that utilizes technologies such as Node.js, Express, JWT, and Mongoose. It supports authentication operations like login, logout, and register. Additionally, it enables order-related actions such as order creation, updating orders, and viewing all orders. Product management functionalities include product creation, deletion, updating, and image uploading. Furthermore, it supports review-related operations like posting reviews, deleting reviews, and editing reviews.
author: Burak Bilgili
